description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=1/3. Long ago, in the Age of Runic Magia...  Fantastic creatures roamed the land and Runes, the source of all magic, were available to all.  That was until the Rune Lords came to hoard all of the precious Runes.  Particularly the ancient and powerful Runic Magia.  Legend of the Rune Lords: The Quest for Runic Magia is a short-form RPG featuring classic console RPG gameplay.
description.short: Long ago, in the Age of Runic Magia...  Fantastic creatures roamed the land and Runes, the source of all magic, were available to all.  That was until the Rune Lords came to hoard all of the precious Runes.  Particularly the ancient and powerful Runic Magia.  Legend of the Rune Lords: The Quest for Runic Magia is a short-form RPG featuring classic console RPG gameplay.
